item.description:

public boolean isInArea(int x, int y, int x2, int y2) { if ((absX >= x && absX <= x2) && (absY <= y && absY >= y2)) return false; [b] this line is 507[/b] -- > }

[code]public boolean isInArea(int x, int y, int x2, int y2) {
if ((absX >= x && absX <= x2) && (absY <= y && absY >= y2))
return false;
}

public boolean isInBarrows() {
if (isInArea(3522, 9720, 3583, 9675)) return true;
if (isInArea(3546, 3305, 3583, 3264)) return true;
return false;
}
public void barrowsreset() {
killcount = 0;
}[/code]
